cause.description:
My funding for college was cut on 19 July 2007 with just 4 weeks left till i leave for college. Now I need to raise $21500. Please help by praying for me. Please pass on this cause, the more that pray the better.
I will be studding theology. I wold rather not have to go to America to study it, but because of liberal agendas of the universities means that I can not get a good sold education in theology here.
Thank you and may God bless you.
7/31/2007 Proof that your prayers are working. I now (if my figures are right) only need another €12000 ($15000). And I have funds till 9/20/2007. How great is our God.
8/1/2007
A priest friend of mine is calling agroup who apparently has a lot of money. Pray that conversation goes well, and they are wiling to fund the rest of my tuition. Our Lord reigns.
8/3/2007
We are getting closer but we are not there yet. Come l Lord Jesus, come.
1. Help youth of Ireland.
2. Bring the Gospel to the lost.
3. Reform R.E. in Ireland
4. Form St. Antony's Fund for Formation of Irish Youth Ministers.
cause.mission: Send Ronan Gannon to Franciscan University of Steubenville
cause.name: Pray for Ronan to go to FUS
